item.title: Why You Should Emulate Containers in Python
item.description: The problem Say that you have a list of items and each item has a price. You would like to highlight the item or items that have the lowest price. If all of the items are the same price you wouldn’t like to highlight any of them. We might have something like the following import sys class Item: def __init__(self, name, price): self.name = name self.price = price items = [Item("1", 1), Item("2", 2), .
